emuInput.TitMainTitle: For Rent sign for 3 & 4 room luxury apartments, phone number JA-1-8244, hung from apartment building at 711 Wandless Street, Hill District
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 23, 1960, pg. 2 reads: " 'Luxurious Rentals,; Non-luxurious Apartments - There are many who believe that there is no place like home, but some tenants, one in particular, in "luxury apartments" at 71 [711] Wandless St., Hill District, are not so sure. The rentals are too high for the poor living conditions of the apartments, they charge...Lower right, someone once said: "Don't believe everything you read."  Whatever the original reference was, it certainly seems to apply in the case of this sign.  Apparently the only thing luxurious about these "luxury" apartments is the rent...-Harris Photos."
